sentences: George Kelly (July 31, 1915 â€“ May 24, 1998) was an American jazz tenor saxophonist and arranger born in Miami, Florida.
Panama Francis was a sideman in Kelly's band in the 1930s; Kelly played in Francis's Savoy Sultans band in the 1970s, and had played in Al Cooper's band of the same name in the 1940s.
